data.title: The Barcelona reader: cultural readings of a city 9781786940322, 9781786948168, 8470885839, 1786940329
data.text:
Table of contents :

Conté: Introduction: Barcelona: cultural readings of a city / Enric Bou and Jaume Subirana

Barcelona: The siege city / Robert Davidson

Barcelona as an adaptative ecology / Ferran Sagarra

A present past, Barcelona streets names, from Víctor Balaguer to Pasqual Maragall / Jaume Subirana

"The asylum of modern times": Barcelona and Europe / Felipe Fernández-Armesto

A fragile country / Colm Tóibín

Barcelona and modernity / Brad Epps

Football and identities in Catalonia / Alejandro Quiroga

The family and the city: power and the creation of cultural imagery / Gary Wray McDonogh

Memory and the city in Barcelona's cemeteries / Elisa Martí López

Picasso among his fellows at 4 Gats: Beyond Modernism? / Jordi Falgàs

Gaudí: poet of stone, artistic hedgehog / Marià Marín y Torné

El Poble Espanyol=El Pueblo Español / Jordana Mendelson

Barcelona: Urban identity 1992-2002 / Donald McNeill

From the Olympic torch to the Universal Forum of Cultures: The after-image of Barcelona's modernity / Joan Ramon Resina

La Gran Encisera: Three odes to Barcelona, and a film / Josep Miquel Sobrer

The deceptive dame: Criminal revelations of the Catalan capital / Stewart King

A Biutiful city: Alejandro González Iñárritu's filmic critique of the "Barcelona Model" / Benjamin Fraser
